Topic.Title: How to get rid of articles

Posts.EditableText: Probably a beginner mistake, but how do I get rid of articles like a and an? I want to say "you are outside" but it makes it say "you are an outside"
Posts.HTML: Probably a beginner mistake, but how do I get rid of articles like a and an? I want to say "you are outside" but it makes it say "you are an outside"

Posts.EditableText: Untick the "default prefix" check box on the Setup tab of the room.
Posts.HTML: Untick the "default prefix" check box on the Setup tab of the room.
